amendment.description: Amendment sought to give the Board authority to impose sanctions on a party for presenting a frivolous or vexatious filing during pre-election proceedings.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in House Report 112-291 to give the Board authority to impose sanctions on a party for presenting a frivolous or vexatious filing during pre-election proceedings.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 228 (Roll no. 864).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Bishop (NY).
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bishop (NY) amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 187 - 228 (Roll no. 864).
